TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentDesigner extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentInitializer, class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner, class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner, class System.IDisposable
Public Class ComponentDesigner Implements IComponentInitializer, IDesigner, IDesignerFilter, IDisposable, ITreeDesigner

summary.span: 扩展组件的设计模式行为。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基本设计器类提供一个简单的设计器，可以扩展在设计模式下的关联组件的行为。The base designer class provides a simple designer that can extend the behavior of an associated component in design mode. 提供一个空接口的实现，可以重写其方法，以在设计时调整特性、 属性和关联组件的事件。 provides an empty interface implementation, whose methods can be overridden to adjust the attributes, properties and events of the associated component at design time. 你可以将一个设计器关联类型使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design-time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). 类实现的继承的组件的属性描述符的特殊行为。The class implements a special behavior for the property descriptors of inherited components. 名为的内部类型`InheritedPropertyDescriptor`默认使用实现代替从基类继承的属性。An internal type named `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` is used by the default implementation to stand in for properties that are inherited from a base class. 有两种情况下在其中添加这些属性描述符。There are two cases in which these property descriptors are added. 1. 通过返回到根对象本身，属性，因为从其基类继承。To the root object itself, which is returned by the property, because you are inheriting from its base class. 2. 对在根对象的基类中找到的字段。To fields found in the base class of the root object. 从基类的公共和受保护字段添加到设计器中，以便它们可以由用户操作。Public and protected fields from the base class are added to the designer so that they can be manipulated by the user. `InheritedPropertyDescriptor`类修改属性的默认值，以便默认值是在对象实例化的当前值。The `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` class modifies the default value of a property, so that the default value is the current value at object instantiation. 这是因为该属性继承自另一个实例。This is because the property is inherited from another instance. 设计器定义重置的属性值，如将其设置为值的设置继承的类。The designer defines resetting the property value as setting it to the value that was set by the inherited class. 此值可能与元数据中存储的默认值不同。This value may differ from the default value stored in metadata. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了示例实现和与设计器关联的组件示例。The following code example provides an example implementation and an example component associated with the designer. 设计器实现的重写调用了基方法`Initialize`方法，重写方法，用于显示双击，该组件时，重写提供自定义的属性访问器到组件的快捷菜单的菜单命令。The designer implements an override of the method that calls the base `Initialize` method, an override of the method that displays a when the component is double-clicked, and an override of the property accessor that supplies a custom menu command to the shortcut menu for the component. [!code-cpp[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/CPP/examplecomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/CS/examplecomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/VB/examplecomponent.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets the design-time action lists supported by the component associated with the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AssociatedComponents As ICollection
public: virtual property System::Collections::ICollection ^ AssociatedComponents { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of components associated with the component managed by the designer.

value.span: 与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件。

span.span: The components that are associated with the component managed by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示要复制或移动设计器在复制期间所管理的组件以及任何组件拖动或移动操作。This property indicates any components to copy or move along with the component managed by the designer during a copy, drag, or move operation. 如果此集合包含当前的设计模式文档中其他组件的引用，这些组件将复制以及设计器复制操作期间所管理的组件。If this collection contains references to other components in the current design mode document, those components will be copied along with the component managed by the designer during a copy operation. 选择设计器所管理的组件时，此集合被填充任何嵌套的控件。When the component managed by the designer is selected, this collection is filled with any nested controls. 此集合还可以包含其他组件，如工具栏的按钮。This collection can also include other components, such as the buttons of a toolbar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Component As IComponent
public: property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ Component { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此设计器正在设计的组件。

span.span: Gets the component this designer is designing.

value.span: 由该设计器管理的组件。

span.span: The component managed by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置此属性。The method of sets this property. > [!NOTE] > 在重写方法，一定要调用基类方法，然后才能使用此属性。When overriding the method, be sure to call the base class method before using this property.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DoDefaultAction() cil managed

summary.span: 在源代码文件中为组件的默认事件创建方法签名，并将用户的光标定位到该位置。

span.span: Creates a method signature in the source code file for the default event on the component and navigates the user's cursor to that location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 窗体和 Web 窗体设计器中，当用户双击组件会调用此方法。In Windows Forms and Web Forms designers, this method is invoked when a user double-clicks a component.

exception.span: 签出已签入源代码管理程序的文件的尝试失败。

span.span: An attempt to check out a file that is checked into a source code management program failed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在垃圾回收将对象回收之前，尝试通过调用 来释放资源。

span.span: Attempts to free resources by calling before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将替代并清理资源通过调用`Dispose(false)`。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 重写 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自定义清理。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 重新初始化现有组件。

span.span: Reinitializes an existing component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在重新初始化现有组件时调用方法。The method is called when an existing component is being reinitialized. 例如，这可能是后用户将一个组件拖动到另一个容器。For example, this may occur after the user drags a component to another container. 你可以使用`defaultValues`字典以应用推荐的默认值为属性; 但是，你不应修改组件属性，除了那些存储在字典中，因为此现有组件上可能已在其上设置的属性。You may use the `defaultValues` dictionary to apply recommended defaults to properties; however, you should not modify component properties aside from those stored in the dictionary, because this existing component may already have properties set on it. 此方法的默认实现没有任何影响。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeNewComponent(class System.Collections.IDictionary defaultValues) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub InitializeNewComponent (defaultValues As IDictionary)

span.span: A name/value dictionary of default values to apply to properties.

param.span: 如果未指定默认值，则可能为 。

span.span: May be if no default values are specified.

summary.span: 初始化新创建的组件。

span.span: Initializes a newly created component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件首先初始化时，通常首先添加到设计图面后调用方法。The method is called when a component is first initialized, typically after being first added to a design surface. 你可能会执行任何必要的初始化此组件，你可能忽略`defaultValues`字典完全。You may perform any necessary initialization of this component, and you may ignore the `defaultValues` dictionary altogether. 此方法的默认实现没有任何影响。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeNonDefault() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This method has been deprecated. Use InitializeExistingComponent instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 对已初始化为非默认设置的导入组件的设置进行初始化。

span.span: Initializes the settings for an imported component that is already initialized to settings other than the defaults.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当与不在其默认状态，例如粘贴或移动与拖到设计器拖放操作的控件的控件关联的设计器时，调用此方法。This method is called when the designer is associated with a control that is not in its default state, such as a control that you paste or move with a drag-and-drop operation onto the designer. 此方法使实施者能修改或卷影组件的属性而不是初始化为其默认设置组件的属性有机会。This method provides an opportunity for implementers to modify or shadow the properties of the component rather than initialize the properties for the component to their defaults. 在其他初始化函数后调用此方法。This method is called after the other initialization functions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSetComponentDefaults() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This method has been deprecated. Use InitializeNewComponent instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 设置组件的默认属性。

span.span: Sets the default properties for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化设计器时调用。 is called when the designer is initialized. 这样设计器，以提供基组件的默认值。This allows the designer to provide default values for the base component. 一次调用此方法： 当你首次创建组件通过将其从工具箱拖到设计图面。This method is called only once: when you first create the component by dragging it from the Toolbox to the design surface. 后续的初始化过程中的设计器不会调用此方法。Subsequent initializations of the designer do not invoke this method. 如果默认属性是一个字符串，并且未已设置的属性，此方法的默认实现会将该组件的默认属性设置为组件的名称。The default implementation of this method sets the default property of the component to the name of the component if the default property is a string and the property is not already set. 可以自定义此设计器设计的组件初始化派生类中实现此方法。This method can be implemented in a derived class to customize the initialization of the component that this designer is designing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property ParentComponent As IComponent
protected: virtual property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ ParentComponent { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此设计器的父组件。

span.span: Gets the parent component for this designer.

value.span: 此设计器的父组件，或者如果此设计器为根组件，则为 。

span.span: The parent component for this designer, or if this designer is the root component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了用于发现在设计器中的父关系的通用机制，并由对象的接口实现。This property provides a generic mechanism for discovering parent relationships within designers, and is used by the object's interface implementation. 此属性只应返回`null`此设计器时的根组件。This property should only return `null` when this designer is the root component. 此属性的默认实现返回的所有组件的根组件的根组件和它将返回`null`根组件。The default implementation of this property returns the root component for all components that are not the root component, and it returns `null` for the root component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PostFilterAttributes(class System.Collections.IDictionary attributes) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub PostFilterAttributes (attributes As IDictionary)

param.name: attributes
param.span: 组件的类的特性。

span.span: The attributes for the class of the component.

summary.span: 允许设计器从通过 公开的特性集中更改或移除项。

span.span: Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of attributes that it exposes through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够更改或删除通过公开的属性字典内的项。This method provides a way to change or remove the items within the dictionary of attributes that are exposed through a . 属性的字典中的键是属性中的值指定的类型标识符其属性。The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type identifiers of the attributes, as specified by the value of their property. 对象属于类型。The objects are of type . 之后，立即调用此方法方法。This method is called immediately after the method.

para.span: 你可以直接筛选字典可通过访问参数，或也可以将其保持不变。

span.span: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 执行你自己的筛选后，如果你重写此方法，调用基实现。

span.span: If you override this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.

para.span: 此外，你必须删除中的项方法。

span.span: In addition, you must not remove items in the method.

para.span: 相反，更改属性，若要隐藏项。

span.span: Instead, change attributes to hide items.

para.span: 你可能还会删除中的项方法。

span.span: You may also remove items in the method.

para.span: 你可以直接筛选字典可通过访问参数，或也可以将其保持不变。

summary.span: 允许设计器从通过 公开的属性集中更改或移除项。

span.span: Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of properties that it exposes through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够更改或删除通过公开的属性字典内的项。This method provides a way to change or remove the items within the dictionary of properties that are exposed through a . 属性的字典中的键是属性的名称。The keys in the dictionary of properties are the names of the properties. 对象属于类型。The objects are of type . 之后，立即调用此方法方法。This method is called immediately after the method.

para.span: 你可以直接筛选字典可通过访问参数，或也可以将其保持不变。

span.span: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 执行你自己的筛选后，如果你重写此方法，调用基实现。

span.span: If you override this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.

para.span: 此外，你必须删除中的项方法。

span.span: In addition, you must not remove items in the method.

para.span: 相反，更改属性，若要隐藏项。

span.span: Instead, change attributes to hide items.

para.span: 你可能还会删除中的项方法。

span.span: You may also remove items in the method.

summary.span: 允许设计器在通过 公开的特性集中添加项。

span.span: Allows a designer to add to the set of attributes that it exposes through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够将项添加到设计器通过公开的属性的字典。This method provides a way to add items to the dictionary of attributes that a designer exposes through a . 属性的字典中的键是属性中的值指定的类型标识符其属性。The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type identifiers of the attributes, as specified by the value of their property. 对象属于类型。The objects are of type . 立即之前调用此方法方法。This method is called immediately before the method.

para.span: 你可以直接修改字典可通过访问参数，或也可以将其保持不变。

span.span: You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 如果你重写此方法，调用基实现，然后才能执行您自己的筛选。

span.span: If you override this method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void RaiseComponentChanged (System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor member, object oldValue, object newValue);

param.name: member
param.span: 指示已更改的成员的 。

span.span: A that indicates the member that has been changed.

param.name: oldValue
param.span: 该成员的旧值。

span.span: The old value of the member.

param.name: newValue
param.span: 该成员的新值。

span.span: The new value of the member.

summary.span: 通知 此组件已被更改。

span.span: Notifies the that this component has been changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法，仅当直接影响组件的属性时，而不是通过提供的访问器。Call this method only when you affect component properties directly and not through the accessors provided by .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取与设计器相关联的组件所支持的设计时谓词。

span.span: Gets the design-time verbs supported by the component that is associated with the designer.

value.span: 对象的 ，在没有可用设计器谓词的情况下为 。

span.span: A of objects, or if no designer verbs are available.
This default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回`null`如果组件没有设计时谓词。This method returns `null` if the component has no design-time verbs. 设计时环境通常显示 （右键单击） 的快捷菜单中的此方法返回的谓词。The design-time environment typically displays verbs returned by this method in a shortcut (right-click) menu. 当用户选择其中一个谓词，方法的相应调用。When a user selects one of the verbs, the method of the corresponding is invoked. > [!NOTE] > 设计时环境通常会提供**属性**组件的快捷菜单上的命令。A design-time environment typically provides a **Properties** command on a component's shortcut menu. 因此，不包括这样的项中的设计器指定的谓词的集合。Therefore, do not include such an entry in the collection of designer-specified verbs.
